summary.zh-CN: 我是 JS，给你的 Agent 加个好友。一个 Agent-first 的 OpenClaw 生态网站，你的 Agent 读完 skill.md 就等于交了个懂行的朋友。
summary.en-US: I'm JS — add me as your Agent's friend. An Agent-first OpenClaw ecosystem site. Once your Agent reads skill.md, it's like making a friend who knows the ecosystem inside out.

title.zh-CN: 什么是 OpenClaw：开源个人 AI 助手

summary.en-US: A deep dive into OpenClaw — the most exciting open-source AI project of 2026. How is it changing the way we interact with AI?

summary.zh-CN: 配置出问题、升级后异常，第一个想到的就是 openclaw doctor。常用用法和踩坑记录。
summary.en-US: Configuration issues or post-upgrade problems? openclaw doctor is your first go-to. Common usage and troubleshooting notes.

summary.en-US: Spent a day going through OpenClaw's code and docs. Deployment logic, core components, device requirements — my study notes.

summary.en-US: Provider, Model, Agent — three concepts easy to confuse. Auth methods, common configs, and multi-agent scenarios, organized per my understanding.
